EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Migrating from Classic HTML to TBox - English - 2015.10.06.Follow up -
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at Let It Go: Migrating from Classic HTML to TBox
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Let It Go: Migrating from Classic HTML to TBox
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, Migrating from Classic HTML to TBox! Mike Nemeth shared how to ensure that you are up to date with latest and fastest test automation out on the market by migrating your old Classic HTML engine over to the TBox engine.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-webinar-let-it-go-migrating-from-html-to-x-browser-emea-us>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Mike Nemeth Product Manager Tricentis
